sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Heading, Flex, Stack, Box, Text, List, ListItem, ListIcon, Divider, Link, Icon, Avatar, Button } from '@chakra-ui/core'; import Container from '../components/Container'; import Subscribe from '../components/Subscribe'; const VideoCard = ({ title, length, href, children, ...rest }) => ( {title} {length} {children} ); const Index = () => ( RENDY DWI PUTRA CHANNEL{' '} YOUTUBE Temukan keseruan dan ilmu yang tidak akan kalian dapatkan dimana pun, selain di CHANNEL YOUTUBE RENDY DWI PUTRA. SIAPA RENDY DWI PUTRA?? Hai semua!!! perkenalkan saya Rendy dwi putra. Saya anak kedua dari tiga bersaudara satu kakak perempuan dan satu adik perempuan. Saya lahir di Banyuwangi pada tanggal 16 April 2000. -Pendidikan Yang Sudah di Tempuh Rendy : SDN 1 MOJOPANGGUNG SMPN 1 GLAGAH SMKN 1 GLAGAH STIKOM PGRI BANYUWANGI (SAAT INI) HOBBY..? Berbeda dengan anak muda pada umumnya, hanya kebanyakan fokus dengan 1 hobi saja. saya tidak memiliki hobi yang tetap, saya tipe orang suka mencoba hal yang baru. dari hobi elektronika selanjutnya saya mencoba mempelajari elektronika audio, dan begitu seterusnya. lebih tepatnya saya suka mempelajari hal yang baru. jika saya ditanya, apa hobi kamu? Saya akan menjawab mempelajari hal yang baru. Electronics Electronic Goods Repair Photography Cinematic Video B-Roll Video Editing (saat ini!!) Course Overview Kenapa aku membuat CHANNEL YOUTUBE? ini berhubungan dengan hobi aku saat ini, yaitu video editing. YouTube bagi aku sangat cocok untuk dijadikan tempat untuk menampilkan karya yang sudah aku buat. Aku juga berencana membuat konten tentang coading, tetapi aku belum terlalu mahir dalam hal coading. bagi kalian yang ingin belajar coading, aku saranin kalian ke Channel  LEE ROBINSHON  kalian juga bisa mengunjungi  Websitenya. Learn about the fundamentals of Next.js and how it compares to Gatsby and Create React App. A quick refresher on props and state, classes vs. functional components, and React Hooks. Install Next.js and get it running locally, with thoughts about linting and formatting. Learn how to make client-side transitions between pages and fetch data from URLs. Configure CSS, Sass, or CSS-in-JS, while discussing responsive and mobile-first design. Ditch your custom server for API Routes with Hasura and GraphQL. Handle image compression, optimization, and learn about meta tags and the open-graph schema. Hands-on example building an MDX blog and using StaticKit and Theme UI. Learn about JWTs and pros/cons between Auth0 and Firebase. Build login and sign-up pages. Testing best practices with React Testing Library and handling errors with Sentry. Should I use Redux or React Context? Plus, configuring TypeScript and more. Ship your application with Vercel or Netlify and learn about pre-rendering and serverless functions. Build a static site backed by a Prisma database in this complete tutorial. What people are saying. "Lee is an awesome teacher and I really enjoyed taking this course. It not only touches on the core of Next.js, but also broader concepts like TypeScript, testing and authentication. Videos are great quality and good length. I would definitely recommend to both newcomers to Next.js as well as to people who want to sharpen themselves on the Next.js fundamentals." Maurits Misana Mastering Next.js "Not only did I enjoy your Mastering Next.js course, but I learned many things entirely new to me. This course opened my eyes to what's possible and what you can achieve with these technologies." Jos Llamas Mastering Next.js Aku Rendy Dwi Putra dhkbfdkgbdkjfgkdfgdgnkdfgddgd dfgkdfnkng. more about me » ); export default Index;
